alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LOGAN, SOUTHEASTERN HARDIN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near West Mansfield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Kenton, West Mansfield, Northwood, Mount Victory, Rushsylvania, Ridgeway, Hepburn, Mentzer, Byhalia, Big Springs and Pfeiffer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
